name: flopron
description: PKM for people with floppy neurons

scripts.dev: concurrently -n TSC,ESBUILD,ELEC -c blue,yellow,green 'tsc -w' 'esbuild src/renderer.ts --bundle --platform=browser --outfile=dist/renderer.js --external:electron --jsx=automatic --loader:.tsx=tsx --loader:.ts=ts --format=iife --target=es2020 --define:process.env.NODE_ENV=\"development\" --watch' 'wait-on dist/main.js dist/renderer.js && nodemon --watch src --watch index.html --ext ts,tsx,html --exec "electron . --enable-logging"'
scripts.dev:simple: pnpm run build && electron . && echo 'App closed. Run again: pnpm run dev:simple'

author: Lucy Qiu
